headline: Cohen & Steers Announces Changes to Realty Indexes
summary: Cohen & Steers, Inc. (NYSE: CNS) announced today pending changes to its Realty Majors Portfolio Index (RMP) and Global Realty Majors Portfolio Index (GRM), effective as of the close of business on August 15, 2025.

raw.headline: Cohen & Steers Announces Changes to Realty Indexes
raw.summary: Cohen & Steers, Inc. (NYSE: CNS) announced today pending changes to its Realty Majors Portfolio Index (RMP) and Global Realty Majors Portfolio Index (GRM), effective as of the close of business on August 15, 2025.

headline: Do Wall Street Analysts Like Ventas Stock?
summary: Ventas has outpaced the broader market over the past year, and Wall Street analysts maintain a highly optimistic outlook on the stock’s prospects.

raw.headline: Do Wall Street Analysts Like Ventas Stock?
raw.summary: Ventas has outpaced the broader market over the past year, and Wall Street analysts maintain a highly optimistic outlook on the stock’s prospects.

headline: Discovery Senior Living Selected to Operate 15 Ventas-Owned Communities, Expanding Discovery's Portfolio and Strategic Relationship
summary: Bonita Springs, Florida--(Newsfile Corp. - August 8, 2025) - Discovery Senior Living ("Discovery" or the "Company") one of the nation's largest most trusted senior housing operators, is pleased to announce it has been selected by Ventas, Inc. ("Ventas") to assume operations of 15 senior living communities across multiple U.S. states. The transition marks an expansion of a multi-year, performance-driven relationship between the two companies and reinforces a shared commitment to operational excel
